pkgmetadata.longdescription: Supporting Objects for Sojourn Accelerometer Methods // Stores objects (e.g. neural networks) that are needed for using Sojourn accelerometer methods. For more information, see Lyden K, Keadle S, Staudenmayer J, Freedson P (2014) doi:10.1249/MSS.0b013e3182a42a2d, Ellingson LD, Schwabacher IJ, Kim Y, Welk GJ, Cook DB (2016) doi:10.1249/MSS.0000000000000915, and Hibbing PR, Ellingson LD, Dixon PM, Welk GJ (2018) doi:10.1249/MSS.0000000000001486.
